text: واقيموا۟ الوزن بالقسط ولا تخسروا۟ الميزان

translations.translation: Give just weight - do not skimp in the balance.
And observe correct measure, weigh with justice, and not cheat the balance.
but weigh things equitably and skimp not in the balance.
Therefore, maintain just measure and do not transgress against the Balance.
And establish the measures justly, nor decrease the due weight.
And observe the weight with equity and do not make the balance deficient.
And keep up the balance with equity and do not make the measure deficient.
and weigh with justice, and skimp not in the Balance.)
But observe the measure strictly, nor fall short thereof.
Always measure with justice and do not give short measure.
And observe the weight with equity, and make not deficient the balance.
Maintain the weights with justice, and do not shorten the balance!’
So establish weight with justice and fall not short in the balance.
And observe the weight with equity and do not make the balance deficient.
Give just weight and do not skimp the scales.
But maintain the weights with justice, and do not violate the balance.
And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.
[55:9] And observe the weights with justice, fairly, and do not skimp the balance, [do not] decrease [the value of] what is being weighed.

(But observe the measure strictly) keep the balance of the scale justly; and it is also said that this means: observe your tongues by saying only the Truth, (nor fall short thereof) do not weigh less for the people such that you take away their rights.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَلاَ تُخْسِرُواْ ٱلْمِيزَانَ } معناه لا تَنقُصُوه

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما سمعتم حال العلويات والسلفليات، وما فيهما من الموازين المعتدلة الموضوعة بالوضع الإلهي { أَقِيمُواْ } أيها المكلفون فيما بينكم { ٱلْوَزْنَ } واعتدلوه { بِٱلْقِسْطِ } والإنصاف { وَلاَ تُخْسِرُواْ } ولا تنقصوا { ٱلْمِيزَانَ } [الرحمن: 9] إذ هو موضع على العدل السوي

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: وأمر بذلك { ألاَّ تَطْغَوْا في الميزانِ } أي: لئلا تجوروا في الميزان بعد الإنصاف في حقوق العباد، فـ " أن " ناصبة، أو مُفَسِّرة، أو ناهية، { وأَقيموا الوزنَ بالقِسْطِ } وأقيموا أوزانكم بالعدل { ولا تُخْسِرُوا الميزانَ } ولا تنقصوه بالتطفيف، نهى عن الطغيان، الذي هو اعتداء وزيادة، وعن الخسران، الذي هو تطفيف ونقصان، وكرّر لفظ " الميزان " تشديداً للوصية، وتقويةً للأمر باستعماله الحثّ عليه
